channel.title: NSX on Green Reed Technology - Technology without boundaries
channel.description: Recent content in NSX on Green Reed Technology - Technology without boundaries

item.title: VMware NSX+
item.description: VMware recently presented at the Tech Field Day Extra event during VMware Explore 2023. The presentation covered VMware’s networking and security product updates. VMware is most known for it’s flagship VMware vSphere product (ESXi and vCenter) that enables organizations to run on-prem workloads in a virtualized fashion. NSX is a complimentary network virtualization solution that provides a way to effectively abstract the underlying network and offer network functions like routing, load balancing, distributed firewalls, and more.
